nodes.text: Das Depu Epu Sea, or Deep Dark Water, was an epic poem belonging to the Gungan culture of Naboo. Written in both Gungan Basic and Old Gungan, this ode to Da Beauty Al'Round would make a great impression on a Gungan family if used during the course of a visit.
An excerpt of the poem is as follows (courtesy of the Baobab Archives):
All dha Gunga wail an gnash,
